descriptionHtml:
Hot Shots! Chickens

By: MrVegaBiggs (also MrBat on STEAM)

Version: 1.1

Download: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3863
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=8122

###############################################################################

1. Description

2. Changelog

3. Installation

4. Uninstallation

5. Troubleshooting

6. Permissions


###############################################################################


=============================================================================================
1. Description
=============================================================================================

When you don't have an arrow on you, you've got to improvise whith what you have around you...
A chicken ? Alright! Shoot it!

Yep, it's inspired by the hilarious (isn't it?) scene from Hot Shots! Part Deux.

You can find a chest full of "Chicken Arrows" in the Breezehome in Whiterun.
Or simply kill a chicken and loot it.

Chicken Arrows are slightly better than Daedric ones dealing 26dmg.
They are more affected by gravity than other arrows.
They deal a heavier impact when they land.


=============================================================================================
2. Changelog
=============================================================================================

1.0:
Original File
-----------------------------------------------------------------------
- Chicken Arrows added
- Chicken Quiver added
- Chicken Chest added in Breezehome in Whiterun
- Chicken Arrows pickable from dead chikens


=============================================================================================
3. Installation
=============================================================================================

------------------------------------------------------------
If you install manually
------------------------------------------------------------

- Extract the file and merge the Data folder and everything whithin with
the Data folder located in ***where you put it*** /STEAM/SteamApps/common/skyrim/

------------------------------------------------------------
or Subscribe on Steam Workshop
------------------------------------------------------------

- Go to http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/**** and click subscribe.
- The next time you start the Skyrim Launcher, Hot Shots! Chickens will be downloaded and installed automatically.

------------------------------------------------------------
or auto download with NMM
------------------------------------------------------------

- Click the 'Download with manager' button on top of the file.
- Hot Shots! Chickens will appear in in NMM's Mods list once it's downloaded. Double-click the Hot Shots! Chickens entry to activate it.

------------------------------------------------------------
or Manual Download with NMM
------------------------------------------------------------

- Start NMM and click on 'Mods'.
- In the left icon bar, click on 'Add Mod From File' and select the downloaded archive file.
- Hot Shots! Chickens will now appear in the list. Double-click the entry to activate it.


=============================================================================================
4. Uninstallation
=============================================================================================

------------------------------------------------------------
NMM
------------------------------------------------------------

In NMM's mod list, search for the Hot Shots! Chickens entry and deactivate the mod.

------------------------------------------------------------
Steam workshop
------------------------------------------------------------

Unsubscribe from the mod and deactivate it in Skyrim Launcher (if you haven't already).
There, you can also completely remove it by highlighting it and pressing 'Delete Selected'.

------------------------------------------------------------
Manual
------------------------------------------------------------

- Locate the 'Data/' folder in your Skyrim installation directory
in ***where you put it*** /STEAM/SteamApps/common/skyrim/
- Delete 'Hot Shots! Chickens.esp' and 'Hot Shots! Chickens.bsa' from the data folder.
- Delete textures/weapons/chicken
- Delete meshes/weapons/chicken

=============================================================================================
5. Troubleshooting
=============================================================================================

Not any so far...


=============================================================================================
6. Permissions
=============================================================================================

The model used is a moddification of the vanilla normal chicken so i don't claim
anything if use the model. You can use the Hot Shots! Chickens in your own mod or video,
please give a note and a link to the original mod.
author: MrVegaBiggs
